scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run --cwd api dev" "bun run --cwd front dev"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd api build && bun run --cwd front build
scripts.test: bun run --cwd api test && bun run --cwd front test
scripts.coverage: bun run --cwd api coverage && bun run --cwd front coverage
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd api lint && bun run --cwd front lint
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd api typecheck && bun run --cwd front typecheck
